author: Staff Reporter
text:
MMTC Limited will organise an exhibition cum sale of Indian gold coins on Wednesday.

Organised in connection with Republic Day celebrations, the event will be open for people from 10 a.m. to 5.30 p.m.

The Indian gold coin, which is of 24 carat purity, has the national emblem and Mahatma Gandhi engraved on it.

The limited edition is available in denominations of 5, 10 and 20 grams.

Visitors can also purchase MMTC gold and silver medallions, sterling silver articles and gold jewellery.

The exhibition will be held at Essar House, Second floor, No.6, Esplanade. For details: 2534 1599.
title: Exhibition, sale of gold coins
